notes: No colophon found. Text ends on folio 59a (page 61) with Chagatai Turkish poetry, followed by a small rectangular waqf/ownership seal and the museum shelfmark number 1942. No scribal subscription or signature formula visible anywhere on the last text pages. The attribution to Sultan Muhammad Khandan rests on the YEK cataloguer's entry in Nushayla ilgili kisiler only. The manuscript is beautifully illuminated with gold-flecked paper and tezhip section headers, consistent with a high-quality Herat production, but the lack of colophon means the attribution cannot be visually confirmed from the digitized images.
